title: Disclaimer - Institute of Pharmacy

Title: Disclaimer - Institute of Pharmacy

By accessing or using or observing this website, you agree to the applicability of our Terms of Use and Conditions (“Terms of Use”) and you are aware of the things we have disclaimed in here and have or may not in future conflict on the same.

Any information on the Web Site including contents, terms and conditions may be changed or updated by Nirma University without notice.
